law.text: If a person is transported with the intent to violate a provision of §§ 3-303 through 3-312, § 3-314, or § 3-315 of this subtitle, and the intent is followed by actual violation of a provision of §§ 3-303 through 3-312, § 3-314, or § 3-315 of this subtitle, the defendant may be tried in the appropriate court in a county where the transportation was offered, solicited, begun, continued, or ended.
